headline: BAC vs. C: Which Bank Stock is Poised to Offer Better Value?
summary: Does Citigroup's restructuring, stronger price gains, lower P/E and higher dividend yield give it an edge over Bank of America for value-focused investors?

headline: Is your AI bet too big? How to balance with other growth themes
summary: Investors heavily exposed to artificial intelligence (AI) may want to think about where else to put their money as markets shift. Drew Pettit, Citi US equity strategist, explains how fintech and wearable tech could balance out investor portfolios. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Citigroup (C) to Redeem $2.5 Billion Notes, Explores Stablecoin Custody Services
summary: Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C) ranks among the best diversified bank stocks to invest in right now. On August 22, Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C) stated that it is looking to redeem $2.5 billion in notes due in 2025 as part of its liability management strategy. This redemption will include $1.75 billion in fixed-rate notes and $750 million in […]
